xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'InvoicesCode.InvoicesTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( <input type="hidden" name="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_number" value="$request.number"/>
#if ($request.number) ; $escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('number', false, false)) : $request.number #else ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_number">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('number', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('number') #end
#if ($request.type) <input type="hidden" name="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_type" value="$request.type"/> #else ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_type">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('type', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('type') #end
; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_customer_user">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('customer_user', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('customer_user') ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_customer_company">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('customer_company', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('customer_company') ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_customer_name">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('customer_name', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('customer_name') ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_customer_address">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('customer_address', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('customer_address') ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_customer_address">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('customer_email', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('customer_email')
; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_date">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('date', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('date')
; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_product">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('product', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('product')
; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_price">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('price', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('price') ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_vat">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('vat', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('vat') ; <label for="InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_0_currency">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('currency', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('currency') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
